title: 领地插件圈出现missing language key:invalidnamecharacters
author: _CrazyNut_
txt_content: 圈地输入了res create l领地名字后出现这个missing language key:invalidnamecharacters怎么办啊

replies.author: xkw794154235
replies.txt_content: 提示: 作者被禁止或删除 内容自动屏蔽

replies.author: MMO
replies.txt_content: 汉化文件夹出现了问题  检查一下\plugins\Residence\Language\Chinese.myl

replies.author: _CrazyNut_
replies.txt_content:
MMO 发表于 2014-7-8 16:03
汉化文件夹出现了问题  检查一下\plugins\Residence\Language\Chinese.myl
额 我重装了一次。。。没问题了 知道怎么设置最大圈地的范围么。

l736190890 发表于 2014-7-8 17:04
改了没反应啊。。
我是这样设置的# The maximum number of Residences a player can have.
           MaxResidences: 3
           # The maximum number of physical areas a residence can have.
           MaxAreasPerResidence: 2
           # The maximum number of blocks a Residence can be, East to West (X).
           MaxEastWest: 256
           # The maximum number of blocks a Residence can be, North to South (Z).
           MaxNorthSouth: 256
           # The maximum number of blocks a Residence can be, High to Low (Y).
           MaxUpDown: 256
           # The lowest altitude this group is allowed to protect.
           MinHeight: 0
           # The highest altitude this group is allowed to protect.
           MaxHeight: 255
